package.name: audio_play
package.description: Outputs audio to a speaker from a source node.
package.author: Nate Koenig
package.duild_depend:
audio_common_msgs libgstreamer0.10-dev libgstreamer-plugins-base0.10-dev
roscpp audio_common_msgs libgstreamer0.10-0 libgstreamer-plugins-base0.10-0 gstreamer0.10-plugins-ugly gstreamer0.10-plugins-good
